title: Biden stops short of accusing Russia of war crimes as his UN ambassador says banned weapons are being moved into Ukraine - CNN
content:
1. Biden stops short of accusing Russia of war crimes as his UN ambassador says banned weapons are being moved into Ukraine  CNN
  2. Russia invades Ukraine live updates: The U.N. votes overwhelmingly to condemn Russia's invasion of Ukraine  NPR
  3. Russia attacks urban areas in Ukraine  PIX11 News
  4. US vice president says "everything is on the table" as US continues to assess sanctions on Russia  CNN
  5. Russia-Ukraine war live updates: Kharkiv under fresh attack, Biden says Putin more 'isolated' than ever  NBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Russia is intentionally targeting Ukrainian civilians in its attack on the country, the US President alleged Wednesday, adding to mounting Western warnings of Moscow's brutality as the human toll of the seven-day war creeps higher.
